name: Si-Ling
description:
An oriental themed 1v1 hotseat tactics game with a cartoon graphic style.

Players will lead their 4 units in the 12x12 arena and, with its various gameplay, gain control over the territory and defeat the enemy

Strategy

Turn based player vs player tactics in an arena with obstacles, players will master their own playstyle and exploit their favourite strategies.

Unique units

Every unit is different from the other, having its own stats and a unique ability to use in the battlefield.

DEVELOPED BY:

COMING SOON GAMES (EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL MILAN, YEAR 1, 2018/2019)
